reviewtext: First of all, the applications available on a palm operating system are great.  And the Visor is a good vehicle to access these apps. -- like the  Palm.  The ONE thing I didn't pick up in my research that MAY be pertinent  is that the Visor requires regular battery replacements.  The Palm (I think  starting with the V) has rechargeable batteries that are juiced by the  synch cradle.  I change my Visor's batteries every 3 weeks.  Maybe no big  deal if you have kids at home (and lots of batteries) but I find it a pain.  Is it a $150 pain?  Probably not.  But I wish I had known . . .
